Spells:
Acid Splash (W0 Conj): R60' Single target or 2 adjacent targets suffer 4d6 HP acid (Dexterity neg)
Arcane Lock (W2 Abju): Touched barrier opens only for designated creatures or specified password (Knock suppresses for 10 min)
Chain Lightning (W6 Evoc): R150' 4 targets in a 30' radius suffer 10d8 HP lightning (Dexterity half) [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Clairvoyance (W3 Divi): R1 mile Self gains choice of remote sight or hearing through an invisible sensor for conc up to 10 min
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force and becomes dust if reduced to 0 HP (Dexterity neg); disintegrates large or smaller objects and magical forces [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Fly (W3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed for conc up to 10 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Forcecage (W7 Evoc): R100' Creates choice of 20' barred force cube or 10' solid force box for 1 hr
Greater Invisibility (W4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 min
Hellish Rebuke (K1 Evoc): R60' May cast as a Reaction to inflict 2d10 HP fire on a successful attacker (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Identify (W1 Divi): Self determines magic properties or spells affecting touched [R]
Legend Lore (W5 Divi): Self learns info about a specified person, place, or object
Mage Armor (W1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr (target donning armor ends)
Mage Hand (K0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Magic Mouth (W2 Illu): R30' Target object speaks a 25-word message when triggered [R]
Maze (W8 Conj): R60' Sends target to a labyrinthine demiplane (DC 20 Intelligence escapes) for conc up to 10 min
Melf's Acid Arrow (W2 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 4d4 HP acid, plus 2d4 HP next rd (miss half 1st rd only) [+Level inflicts +1d4 HP]
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum (W4 Abju): R120' Protects up to 100' sq from sound, vision, divination, teleportation, and planar travel for 1 dy [+Level increases area by 100']
Mordenkainen's Sword (W7 Evoc): R60' Spell attack w/force weapon inflicts 3d10 HP force, and weapon moves 20'/rd, for conc or 1 min
Planar Binding (W5 Abju): R60' Binds a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to service (Charisma neg) for 1 dy [+Level extends duration to 10/30/180/366 dy at level 6/7/8/9]
Prestidigitation (W0 Tran): R10' Self may perform minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (W1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead; those creatures suffer Disadv on attacks on target
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius inflicts loss of action (Constitution neg) for conc up to 1 min
Stone Shape (W4 Tran): Reshapes touched medium-sized stone
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides access to similar circles for 1 rd
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3' x 1" force disk floats 3' high 20' behind self, holding 500 lbs for 1 hr [R]
True Polymorph (W9 Tran): R30' Transforms target creature or object (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
True Strike (K0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
True Strike (W0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 K0 spells/May cast chosen K1 spell 1/long rest
Arcane Recovery: May recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest 1/long rest
Blood Channeling: May use own damaged body as arcane focus/May suffer 1d10 HP necrotic per 50 GP to forego material components when casting
Bond Of Mutual Suffering: May use Reaction to inflict equal damage on attacker 2/short rest
Flash Recall: May replace a prepared spell 1/short rest
Glyph Of Hemorrhaging: May curse a successful spell attack target to suffer +1d6 HP necrotic from each attack for 1 min (Constitution ends) 1/short rest
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Sanguine Burst: May take spell level HP necrotic to reroll 1 spell damage dice
Signature Spells: May cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Spell Mastery: May cast chosen W1 spell and W2 spell at will
